title: Let's Trade!  T206's, Musial Exhibit, W card updated
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Let's Trade!  T206's, Musial Exhibit, W card updated
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hi boys and girls. Let's do some trading.  I am looking for T206 and T205 commons, graded or ungraded, that are in the 1.5 to 2.5 range.  I am at about 40% of each set, so I still need a lot of commons.  Feel free to make offers.  I will respond to all emails.  Try me - I'm easy.





Scans of my trade bait are below.



BOTH OF THE T207'S AND THE MANTLE HAVE BEEN TRADED.  THE T205 MILAN AND THE T206 KROH HAVE BEEN TRADED. The CJ has been traded.



I still have the 2 T206's - Abbott and Congalton, the Exhibit, and the W card.





rickmcquillan@gmail.com



Thank you!



Rick
